Detailed Description

A class made to be instantiated for describing an echo.

Author:
Alexander Nordh

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

int  delay,
bool  playEcho 
) [inline]

The constructor of EchoProperties. It takes in all the required input and sets all it's variables to that.

Parameters:
newVolume - The echo's volume.
delay - The delay before the echo is played.
playEcho - A boolean to determine if the echo should be played.

Member Data Documentation

int EchoProperties::delay

The delay before the echo should be played.

float EchoProperties::newVolume

The volume of the echo.

bool EchoProperties::playEcho

A boolean that determines if the echo is worth playing (could be too low or to sudden to be noticed).
